    Methods in control that return PetrinetElement
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PetrinetElement
    PetrinetViewerController.onPetrinetNodeClicked(String id)
    Handle clicks in the petrinet graph -> if the element was a transition, fire it; otherwise return element for graph to handle it.
